text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ryan… here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ines? That's—

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I actually bought it in secret. … But I'm happy. That I can finally give it to you.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I don't think it doesn't suit you. It's okay to like what you like.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Will you accept this, Ryan?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ines………

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Yes. Yes, thank you…… for giving me the courage.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Hey? Could you…… clip it on for me?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ……! …… Sure!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Can I fiddle with your hair too?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Sure.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (Ines runs her hand along the side of my head. Her fingers feel cool as she touches my forehead.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (It tickles when the wind blows, and an unfamiliar rustle reaches my ear from closeby.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … H-How does it look?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hehe… Wait, I'll take a picture for you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … Okay.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Gimme a smile… and snap!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: … Have a look, Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: It looks good on you. Really. Super cute.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: R-Really? … Thanks. ……――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (Suddenly, inadvertently… I was struck by the thought that Ines looked as cool as a manga character a few minutes ago…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (Ahh, so that's it, I thought. …… Yeah. That's what I admired.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (How I wanted to be like. What I wanted to do with the café…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: That's why she gave her a small push, gently trying to bring out her courage.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (I'm sure of it. I always wanted to be like Master.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (To be able to give someone a push when they couldn't muster the courage to take that final step.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (…… Just like you did earlier.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… I'm no match for you, Ines.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ? What's up, Ryan?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Listen, there's something I want to talk to you about. The café's concept… I want to—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ―― I want to reiterate the café's concept as "giving someone a spoonful of courage".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: When you're lost or nervous and can't take that step forwards, we can encourage you, provide that little push in the back. … I thought it would be nice to have a café like that.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Uoooh…! Yeah, that sounds great! So? What should we do?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I haven't thought of anything specific… I wanted to ask you. Does anyone have any ideas?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes, yes! I dooooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Why don't we make a tooooooooon of marvelous chocos?☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: A choco for every customer! Each one made specifically for them☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Everyone has their own unique tastes and feelings☆ So layer them all into the choco★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: You can give them to someone☆ Or just as a present to yourself when you lack courage★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: It's exciting from the moment it's in your hands! Like a push in the back, setting you off on a marvelous dash!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Let's make chocos like that☆★

text_block_list.name: All 4
text_block_list.text: Oohhh～～…!!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Nice, nice!! That's a super nice idea!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I think so too! Thanks, Marvelous. Let's go straight to the owner!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Okay, I need to get myself together too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ines, a moment? … Can you clip the flower on again?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I want to wear it in front of customers this time. So… I want you to make me look cute.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ――! Sure!

text_block_list.name: Customer A
text_block_list.text: Haaah～… Should I give him chocolates～? What'll I do if he doesn't want them……

text_block_list.name: Customer B
text_block_list.text: C'mon, how wishy-washy can you be? But a'ight, that's why I brought you here I guess. Heard courage comes in cups or something—

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Are you two next? There's seats available!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Welcome! To our café!

text_block_list.name: Customer A
text_block_list.text: Whoa… A mountain of chocolate……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, eye-catching, isn't it? Hehe…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Since it's that time of year… we prepared some chocolate to give you the courage to be honest about your feelings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I'm not… very good at being honest either. I dearly understand the feeling of being so close but not being able to make up your mind.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … But if you work up the courage to face your feelings there's a whole new future waiting for you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: And we will gladly help you with that. Let us serve you the last ounce of courage you need to take a step forward.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: You'll certainly find your very own chocolate in there. Each one made to support someone's unique feelings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: So please tell me. What kind of chocolate do you require?
